sys_embedded_help_content.content:
Using the NeedIt List

Use the NeedIt list to search for open and closed NeedIt records and tasks. You can also search for requests assigned to you.

How to Search for NeedIt Tasks

In the main ServiceNow browser window (not studio) use the Application Navigator to open NeedIt > NeedIt Tasks.

How to Search for Existing NeedIt Records.

To search for records assigned to you. In the main ServiceNow browser window (not studio) use the Application Navigator to open NeedIt > My NeedIt Requests.

To search for all records . In the main ServiceNow browser window (not studio) use the Application Navigator to open NeedIt > All.

To search for open records . In the main ServiceNow browser window (not studio) use the Application Navigator to open NeedIt > Open.

Note: Be sure that you are working in the main ServiceNow browser window.

Personalize NeedIt List
sys_embedded_help_content.name: NeedIt List - User
